column4: can someone point me in the right direction on finding sound drivers for this card:   ATI Technologies Inc Manhattan HDMI Audio [Mobility Radeon HD 5000 Series]
ATI HD 5000 series audio drivers are really buggy
even if you get it working it will likely be quiet sound
thanks.  are there *any* drivers available that you knnow of?
realnewnow: I played with it before and tossed it when i realized they were crap, but hold on i'll see if i can look it up again real quick
ok, this is going to sound real noobieish, but how do I turn off the joins/parts in xchat?
yikes.  can't even follow the conversations
realnewnow: I just realized something - what kind of cable are you using?
or are you using a DVI-HDMI adaptor + HDMI cable
theanarchist: msdos or guid, i suggest msdos though
OH, no neither one.  It's on my hp pavillion dv7-4177nr notebook.  the irc command you gave me is giving me no joy.
realnewnow: how are you connecting your audio then? is it directly into the laptop?
yes, its integrated into the laptop MB
